headline: About us

description.line1: Trading company operating extensively in the technical vegetable oil trade industry in Ostrava.
description.line2: In the offer of our technical oils, you can find a wide range of types and qualities, from pure vegetable oils:
description.line3: to oils with increased acidity, and mixtures of vegetable oils prepared especially at the customer's request, under specific parameters.
description.line4: Oiltarator s.r.o. has modern technical facilities with a storage capacity of up to 1,300 tons. Our base is located in Ostrava, approx. 20 km to the Polish border, close to the motorway exit, which makes organizing transport much easier. As a company, we also provide goods storage and reloading services.
description.line5: We invite you to cooperate. We will be happy to answer all your questions.

contacth2: You can find us in the heart of Ostrava, where we specialize in technical vegetable oils. Every visit must be arranged in advance by phone or email. Come and consult with our experts and see our wide range of products. We look forward to your visit and will gladly help you choose the best solution for your needs.
message: If you are interested in any of our services or have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to answer all your questions.

errorpage.line1: Looks like you got lost in the oil.
errorpage.line2: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had it´s name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
